```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
  )
library(LR)
library(bench)
```

bula bula bula
```{r setup}
set.seed(2024)
data <- data.frame(
  x = rnorm(10),
  y = 2 * rnorm(10) + 3
)
model <- my_lm(y ~ x, data)
model$coefficients
model$fitted.values
```

bula bula bula
```{r}
original_model <- lm(y~x, data)
all.equal(model$coefficients, as.vector(coef(original_model)))
```

bula bula bula
```{r}
bench::mark(
  model=my_lm(y ~ x, data = data),
  original_model=lm(y~x, data = data),
  check=FALSE
)
```
